menu.name: Classic BLT Sandwich
menu.description: Crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomato slices on toasted sourdough bread.

menu.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
menu.description: Melted cheddar cheese between two slices of golden, buttered bread.

menu.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
menu.description: Layers of turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted multigrain bread.

menu.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
menu.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork with tangy barbecue sauce on a soft bun.

menu.name: Veggie Delight Sandwich
menu.description: A medley of fresh vegetables and hummus on whole wheat bread.

menu.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
menu.description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

menu.name: Minestrone Soup
menu.description: A hearty Italian soup with vegetables, beans, and pasta in a tomato broth.

menu.name: Tomato Basil Soup
menu.description: Creamy tomato soup with fresh basil, perfect for dipping grilled cheese.

menu.name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
menu.description: Spicy chicken soup with corn, black beans, and crispy tortilla strips.

menu.name: Lentil Soup
menu.description: A nutritious soup made with lentils, carrots, and celery in a savory broth.

menu.name: Butternut Squash Soup
menu.description: Smooth and creamy soup made with roasted butternut squash and a hint of nutmeg.

menu.name: French Onion Soup
menu.description: Caramelized onions in a rich broth, topped with melted cheese and toasted bread.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: Romaine lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese with Greek dressing.

menu.name: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and balsamic glaze.

menu.name: Cobb Salad
menu.description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, eggs, and blue cheese.

menu.name: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
menu.description: Fresh spinach leaves with sliced strawberries, walnuts, and balsamic vinaigrette.

menu.name: Asian Sesame Salad
menu.description: Mixed greens with mandarin oranges, almonds, and sesame dressing.

menu.name: Garlic Bread
menu.description: Warm, buttery bread infused with roasted garlic and parsley.

menu.name: Cheese Breadsticks
menu.description: Soft breadsticks topped with melted mozzarella and served with marinara sauce.

menu.name: Focaccia Bread
menu.description: Italian flatbread seasoned with rosemary and sea salt.

menu.name: Ciabatta Rolls
menu.description: Crusty Italian rolls with a soft, airy interior.

menu.name: Baguette
menu.description: Long, narrow loaf of French bread with a crispy crust.

menu.name: Classic Lemonade
menu.description: Freshly squeezed lemons mixed with a touch of sweetness, served chilled.

menu.name: Iced Coffee
menu.description: Brewed coffee served over ice, with your choice of milk or cream.

menu.name: Green Tea
menu.description: A refreshing cup of hot or iced green tea, light and soothing.

menu.name: Smoothie
menu.description: A creamy blend of fresh fruits and yogurt, available in strawberry, mango, or mixed berry.

menu.name: Sparkling Water
menu.description: Refreshing and bubbly sparkling water, perfect for quenching your thirst.

menu.name: Hot Chocolate
menu.description: Rich and creamy hot chocolate made with premium cocoa, topped with whipped cream.

menu.name: Iced Matcha Latte
menu.description: A cool and creamy iced matcha latte, made with premium matcha green tea.

menu.name: Coca-Cola
menu.description: A refreshing classic cola beverage, served ice-cold.

menu.name: Grilled Steak
menu.description: A perfectly grilled, tender steak served with garlic mashed potatoes and sautéed vegetables.

menu.name: Baked Salmon
menu.description: Fresh salmon fillet baked with a lemon dill sauce, served with roasted asparagus.

menu.name: Chicken Alfredo
menu.description: Grilled chicken served over fettuccine pasta with a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce.

menu.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
menu.description: A colorful mix of seasonal vegetables stir-fried with tofu in a savory soy-ginger sauce, served with jasmine rice.

menu.name: Beef Lasagna
menu.description: Layers of pasta, seasoned ground beef, marinara sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella, baked to perfection.
